summary: This is a simple mod that assigns some of the \"overlapping\" skills for the Guardian Stones. The Mage Stone now includes the Alchemy bonus, and the Warrior stone now includes Marskman and Light Armor bonuses.  An optional version adds One Handed to the Thief Stone.
descriptionHtml:
This is a very simple .esp that assigns some of the \"overlapping\" skills for the Guardian Stones. The Mage Stone now includes the Alchemy bonus, and the Warrior stone now includes Marskman and Light Armor bonuses.  An optional version adds One Handed to the Thief Stone.  I thought it fit for daggers, but seemed a bit unbalanced otherwise.

This will obviously interfere with any other mod that changes these stones.  It\'s such a small change that I wasn\'t going to bother uploading it, but then I totally did.  What a cool story!

Here is a complete list of the skills that the stones will now affect.


=Mage Stone=
Alchemy (added by mod)
Alteration
Conjuration
Destruction
Illusion
Restoration
Enchanting


=Warrior Stone=
Block
Heavy Armor
Light Armor (added by mod)
Marskman (added by mod)
One Handed
Smithing
Two Handed


=Thief Stone=
Alchemy
Light Armor
Lockpicking
Marskman
One Handed (added only in optional version)
Pickpocket
Sneak
Speechcraft


And no, I didn\'t really fill the Guardian Stones with dead cave bears.
author: legendman

files.name: Guardian Stones Class Overlap - Thief Stone Included
files.fileName: Guardian Stones Class Overlap - Thief Stone Included-29910-1-0.rar
